nodes.description: 袭击发生前四天，当地复兴党的防御部队撤走了武器，尽管已知有迫在眉睫的威胁。
袭击者首先攻击了苏韦达市的防御阵地，并在弹药耗尽后引爆了自杀式炸弹背心。
nodes.support_text: The attackers began by assaulting defensive positions in the city. When they depleted their ammunition, they detonated their explosive vests.

nodes.description: ISIL武装分子协同袭击了周边地区和四个村庄，屠杀家庭并劫持了人质。
nodes.support_text: Groups of militants also attacked areas in the Al-Mushannaf nahiyah in a coordinated assault and four villages ( Al-Sbeky , Ramy , Ghethet-Hamael and Tarbeh ), gaining temporary control of several settlements, slaughtered families in their houses and seizing hostages.

nodes.description: 当地民众和德鲁兹民兵自发组织起来，在政府军未到场的情况下夺回了村庄。
nodes.support_text: Local people gathered and defended their villages with simple weapons and retook the villages without support of governmental forces .

nodes.description: 苏韦达省会的蔬菜市场发生自杀式爆炸，造成大量人员伤亡。
nodes.support_text: A suicide bombing in a vegetable market in the capital of the province, Al Suwayda, resulted in at least 38 casualties.

nodes.description: 当晚省长宣布城市安全，叙利亚空军对ISIL控制的村庄发动了空袭。
nodes.support_text: As-Suwayda Governor Amer al-Eshi reported that the city had been secured by evening. The state-run television station, Ikhbariyah TV, reported that the Syrian Air Force has launched a bombing campaign on ISIS-held villages of al-Matouna, Duma, and Tima.

nodes.description: ISIL威胁称，如果叙利亚军队不停止在耶尔穆克盆地的攻势，将处决被俘的德鲁兹妇女。
nodes.support_text: ISIL had threatened to execute the captured Druze women if the Syrian army didn't stop their offensive against ISIL in the Yarmouk basin in western Daraa province.

nodes.description: 7月31日，叙利亚军队为换取释放被俘的德鲁兹妇女，从耶尔穆克盆地撤离了数百名ISIL战斗人员。
nodes.support_text: On the 31st of July 2018, in exchange for the release of the Druze women captured by ISIL in the raid in eastern Suweida, the Syrian Army evacuated hundreds of ISIL fighters from the Yarmouk basin in western Daraa to their strongholds in the Badiya region in eastern Syria Desert.

nodes.description: 叙利亚政府提出用俘虏交换ISIL战斗人员，但ISIL拒绝并要求支付大笔赎金。
nodes.support_text: Afterwards, the Syrian government offered a deal to ISIL, that the 30+ captured Druze civilians will be swapped in the prisoner exchange for over 200 ISIL fighters of Jaysh Khaled bin Walid who surrendered ...

nodes.description: 8月2日，为向政府施压，ISIL处决了一名被俘的德鲁兹男性并公布了视频。
nodes.support_text: ISIL executed all the Druze men they've captured. ISIL executed several Syrian army soldiers and NDF members captured during the raid, posting videos of their executions on the Internet.

nodes.description: 作为回应，叙利亚军队威胁称，若不释放人质，将摧毁巴迪亚地区的ISIL。
